statements: SELECT * FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT legislation_name, legislation_year FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE legislation_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE country = 'Canada' AND legislation_year < 1995;
SELECT legislation_name FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE policy_description LIKE '%equality%';
SELECT country, legislation_name, legislation_year FROM HumanRightsLegislation ORDER BY legislation_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT country, legislation_name FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE legislation_year > 2000 ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT country, legislation_name, legislation_year FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE legislation_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY legislation_year DESC;
SELECT legislation_name, policy_description FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE country IN ('Canada', 'Mexico') AND policy_description LIKE '%human rights%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT country) AS total_countries, MAX(legislation_year) AS latest_legislation_year FROM HumanRightsLegislation;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_legislation;
SELECT legislation_name, country FROM human_rights_legislation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT legislation_name, date_enacted FROM human_rights_legislation ORDER BY date_enacted DESC;
SELECT legislation_name, legislation_description FROM human_rights_legislation WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_description, analysis_date FROM policy_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_legislation;
SELECT legislation_id, legislation_name, country FROM human_rights_legislation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT legislation_name, date_enacted FROM human_rights_legislation ORDER BY date_enacted DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_analysis JOIN human_rights_legislation ON policy_analysis.legislation_id = human_rights_legislation.legislation_id;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_name, legislation_name, analysis_date FROM policy_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT id, title, enacted_date, description FROM human_rights_legislation;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, effective_date FROM human_rights_policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analyst_name, analysis_text FROM human_rights_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, analysis_text FROM human_rights_analysis WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT hr.title, ha.analyst_name FROM human_rights_legislation hr INNER JOIN human_rights_analysis ha ON hr.id = ha.policy_id ORDER BY hr.title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ha.analysis_text, hp.policy_name FROM human_rights_analysis ha INNER JOIN human_rights_policies hp ON ha.policy_id = hp.policy_id WHERE hp.effective_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM human_rights_legislation WHERE enacted_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND id IN (1, 3, 5)

SELECT hp.policy_name, COUNT(ha.analysis_id) AS total_analysis FROM human_rights_policies hp LEFT JOIN human_rights_analysis ha ON hp.policy_id = ha.policy_id GROUP BY hp.policy_name ORDER BY total_analysis DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT hr.title, hp.details FROM human_rights_legislation hr, human_rights_policies hp, human_rights_analysis ha WHERE hr.id = ha.policy_id AND ha.policy_id = hp.policy_id
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsLegislation;
SELECT law_name, jurisdiction FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE jurisdiction='USA';
SELECT analysis_name, analyst_name FROM PolicyAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM LegislationCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT recommendation FROM PolicyRecommendations WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT law_name, enacted_year FROM HumanRightsLegislation WHERE enacted_year > 2000;
SELECT p.analyst_name, l.law_name FROM PolicyAnalysis AS p JOIN HumanRightsLegislation AS l ON p.legislation_id = l.id;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(pr.id) AS num_recommendations FROM LegislationCategories AS c LEFT JOIN PolicyRecommendations AS pr ON c.id = pr.policy_id GROUP BY c.category_name;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_legislation;
SELECT policy_title, date_implemented FROM policies;
SELECT country_name, region, population FROM countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_topic, analyst_name FROM analysis WHERE analysis_topic = 'Freedom of Speech';
SELECT violation_type, incident_date FROM violations WHERE country_id = 1 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_legislation ORDER BY date_enacted DESC, law_title ASC
SELECT policy_title, policy_description FROM policies WHERE date_implemented > '2021-01-01'
SELECT country_name, region, population FROM countries WHERE population > 1000000 ORDER BY region
SELECT violation_type, incident_date FROM violations WHERE country_id = 5
SELECT analysis_topic, analysis_description, analyst_name FROM analysis
